author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The director of The Fall Guy is reportedly in talks to take on Netflix’s Gears of War movie.
title: It Sounds Like Netflix’s Gears of War Movie Is Finally Moving Forward — but We Still Don’t Know Who’s Playing Marcus Fenix

author: Dan Stapleton
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Reviewers Won't Get Started Until June 5

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: On paper, Shadow Labyrinth should not work. Pac-Man as a dark sci-fi metroidvania where he turns into a giant mech and shoots lasers out of his mouth? What?! But somehow, it totally works. Check out our hands-on impressions of this wild take on one of gaming's all-time classics.
title: Shadow Labyrinth’s Weird Metroidvania Take on Pac-Man…Actually Works!

author: Michael Peyton
description: Major Studios including Xbox, Netflix, Ubisoft, Critical role are headed to IGN Live June 7-8 in Los Angeles.
title: More Partners Announced for IGN Live, Setting Up a Weekend of Fan-Fueled Fun

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Take-Two CEO Strauss Zelnick tells IGN that "delays pain me — how could they not?" but has insisted that GTA 6's new 2026 release date was about making sure Rockstar achieves its creative vision "with no limitations."
title: Take-Two CEO Says 'Delays Pain Me — How Could They Not?' but Insists GTA 6's New 2026 Release Date Was About Making Sure Rockstar Achieves Its Creative Vision 'With No Limitations'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Development on GTA 6 began “in earnest” in 2020 following the "massive" success of Red Dead Redemption 2, Rockstar parent company Take-Two has said.
title: GTA 6 Development Began 'In Earnest' in 2020 Following the 'Massive Success' of Red Dead Redemption 2, Take-Two Says

author: Myles Obenza
title: This Retired R2-D2 LEGO Set Is Still Available and Discounted at Amazon

author: Eric Song
description: The best tablets for both students and professionals.
title: Get the Newest Apple iPads (Including 2025 Models) For the Lowest Prices of the Year on Amazon

author: Chris Reed
description: If you like Dungeons & Dragons but want to play something a little more straightforward, we have you covered with a bunch of awesome tabletop games.
title: 11 Board Games Like Dungeons & Dragons Worth Playing in 2025

author: Jacob Kienlen
description: Jigsaw puzzles for all!
title: Amazon Is Slashing Prices on Popular 1,000-Piece Ravensburger Puzzles Once Again

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: How hard will it be to get a Nintendo Switch 2 in the U.S. at launch and during the rest of 2025? According to Nintendo of America boss Doug Bowser, the company believes it will have enough units to meet consumer demand “through the holidays.”
title: Nintendo of America Boss Doug Bowser Insists Nintendo Will Have Enough Switch 2 Units to Meet Demand in the U.S.

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: In an interview to discuss the opening of the Nintendo San Francisco store, IGN asked Nintendo of America boss Doug Bowser if physical media was still going to be a big part of Nintendo’s business, or whether he saw Game-Key Cards as the future. Here's his response.
title: Nintendo Says Switch 2 Game-Key Cards Help Third-Party Publishers Bring ‘Deeper, Larger, and More Immersive Content on the Platform’

author: Logan Plant
description: IGN interviewed Nintendo of America President Doug Bowser to discuss the opening of Nintendo San Francisco, which is Nintendo's first public retail store on the West Coast. We also asked Bowser about Switch 2's price, if Nintendo can meet demand in the United States, Game-Key Cards, and a lot more.
title: Our Big Nintendo San Francisco Interview with Nintendo of America President Doug Bowser

author: Michael Cripe
description: Obsidian Entertainment has released a 2025 post-launch roadmap for Avowed alongside patch notes for its 1.4 update.
title: Avowed Update 1.4 Patch Notes Include Arachnaphobia Mode and 2025 Post-Launch Roadmap

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: DC's Absolute Batman, Marvel's Ultimate Spider-Man, and Fantagraphics' My Favorite Thing Is Monsters are just some of the comics included among the 2025 Eisner Award nominees.
title: Absolute Batman, Ultimate Spider-Man, and More: 2025 Eisner Award Nominees Revealed

author: Eric Song
description: Available in Electric Volt, Lunar Shift, and Mineral Camo colors.
title: Microsoft Xbox Wireless Controllers Start at $32.39 Exclusively at Verizon

description: If you're always gaming on the go with your smartphone, you'll definitely want the best phone controller.
title: The Best Phone Controllers for Mobile Gaming in 2025

author: Eric Van Allen
description: Blue Protocol may have been shut down last year, but it lives on in a new form now with Blue Protocol: Star Resonance. Publisher A Plus unveiled the new MMORPG today, and it's set for launch sometime in 2025.
title: Blue Protocol Gets a Pseudo-Revival in Star Resonance Later This Year

author: Michael Peyton
description: The cast of Critical Role will stop by IGN Live on June 7 to celebrate their 10th anniversary with a special panel for fans.
title: Critical Role Will Celebrate Its 10th Anniversary With a Special Panel at IGN Live

author: Eric Van Allen
description: The Nintendo Switch 2 is getting some extra buttons with specific set-ups, like the Joy-Con 2 Charging Grip and Pro Controller 2. The GL and GR buttons, as they're called, add extra buttons on the underside of the Switch's handles, and Nintendo has shared some examples of just how easy it will be to do so.
title: The Nintendo Switch 2's Optional GR and GL Buttons Look Fairly Easy to Remap

author: Michael Cripe
description: Atlus has revealed its free-to-play spinoff, Persona5: The Phantom X, is coming to PC and mobile devices June 26, 2025.
title: Persona5: The Phantom X Brings the Phantom Thieves to PC and Mobile Devices Next Month

author: Scott Collura
description: You want to know if there are any post- or mid-credits scenes in Final Destination: Bloodlines, and we've got the answer right here.
title: Final Destination: Bloodlines Post-Credits Scene Check-In (No Spoilers)

author: Lex Briscuso
description: The man of steel is back — almost, at least. The latest trailer for James Gunn’s upcoming film Superman has been released ahead of its July launch and it’s chock full of excitement. Between lead David Corenswet’s performance and the top-notch fighting power of Superman’s beloved dog Krypto, there’s a lot to dig into. But it seems as though the main thing fans are curious about in the wake of the trailer is the sheer amount that appears to be going on in this film, and how it plans to properly deal with all of it.
title: Fans Are Wondering How the Superman Movie Is Going to Deal With All Those Side Characters: 'There's a Lot Going on Here'

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: Doom: The Dark Ages has already received a little discount for PC at Fanatical and GMG and at Newegg for an Xbox digital code.
title: Doom: The Dark Ages Is Out Today, and Already on Sale for Xbox and PC

author: Eric Van Allen
description: Smash Together, an unofficial dating app started up for like-minded Smash Bros. players to meet and mingle, has claimed it has received a cease-and-desist letter just before its open beta.
title: Unofficial Dating App For Smash Bros. Players Gets Cease-and-Desist

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Last Saturday, Dexerto broke the story that Japanese developer Arc System Works was hacked, with data allegedly being leaked about Switch 2 game formats, Guilty Gear Strive, and the company’s in-development games.
title: Guilty Gear Developer Arc System Works Addresses Data Leak — Here’s What We Know So Far, Including Potential Info About Nintendo Switch 2 Carts

author: Tom Marks
description: The first DLC expansion is a bit threadbare compared to what came before.
title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - Brushes With Death Review

author: Eric Van Allen
description: The cast of Baldur's Gate 3 has been transformed into pre-painted miniatures by Wizkids. But the new mini's don't seem to be landing for everyone, as even one Baldur's Gate 3 developer took to social media to express frustration with the new figures.
title: Baldur's Gate 3 Minis From WizKids Are Here, and They Aren't Leaving the Best Impression

author: Chris Reed
description: Three big new LEGO sets are out May 15, including LEGO Mario Kart - Mario and Standard Kart, plus a new LEGO Gift with Purchase and a bonus Mario Kart Blue Shell set.
title: LEGO Mario Kart and More New Sets Out May 15

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: “BioShock is still in development,” director Francis Lawrence recently told IGN when asked about his planned Netflix movie adaptation of the acclaimed video game franchise. Terminator: Dark Fate screenwriter Justin Rhodes penned the most recent draft.
title: BioShock Director Says 'We're In a Pretty Good Place' With Netflix's 'Tricky' Movie Adaption

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Two things about Hunger piqued my interest immediately: its visual aesthetic and its actual visuals. Game director Maximilian Rea described Hunger’s look as “Renaissance gothic,” which seems like a fair way to sum it up. Hunger mixes first-gen firearms with brutal melee weapons inside of filthy lived-in towns and glorious castles. And then, in terms of raw graphics, the foliage, lighting, and texture detail are all absolutely stunning.
title: Hunger Is a Multiplayer First-Person RPG That Uses an Extraction Loop but Isn’t Defined by It

author: Christian Wait
description: Magic: The Gathering Final Fantasy preorders are live again for sealed sets and singles. Plus, save 23% on the Xbox Velocity Green Controller at Amazon as of May 15, 2025.
title: Deals For Today: Fresh MTG Final Fantasy Preorders On Sealed And Single Cards

author: Jordan Sirani
description: Our up-to-date streaming guide on how to watch all of the Mission Impossible movies online in 2025.
title: Where to Stream Every Mission Impossible Movie Online in 2025

author: Matt Fowler
description: You maniacs! You want an Apes marathon? Damn youuuu!
title: How to Watch the Planet of the Apes Movies in Chronological Order

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: DC Comics and Ghost Machine are teaming up for a cool crossover that sees the artists of Batman and Geiger trade places. We've got an exclusive first look at the results.
title: DC's Batman and Ghost Machine's Geiger to Cross Over Through New Variant Covers

author: Scott Collura
description: Legendary artist and director Joe Johnston talks about his docuseries debut, Light & Magic Season 2, and what it's like to disagree with George Lucas himself!
title: Joe Johnston on Disagreeing With George Lucas for Light & Magic Season 2: ‘I Don't Remember That at All’

author: Vikki Blake
description: The Pokémon Company has confirmed the Pokémon Fossil Museum is coming to North America in May 2026.
title: The Pokémon Fossil Museum Is Bringing Real and Fake Pokémon Fossils to the U.S. Next Year

author: Vikki Blake
description: A man in the UK has been arrested after police discovered he was harboring a cache of stolen Pokémon cards worth £250,000 (approx. $332,500). Announcing the arrest, local police joked: "Gotta catch 'Em All."
title: Man Arrested After $300,000+ Worth of Stolen Pokémon Cards Discovered During Raid — Police Joke: 'Gotta Catch 'Em All'

author: Matt Purslow
description: The Switch 2 may cost $449, but a high price tag was never going to get in the way of sales. Nintendo has another hit on its hands thanks to an unbeatable game library and a console design that continues to feel important.
title: Why the Switch 2’s Price Was Never Going to Hamper Its Success

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Helldivers 2 "is our main focus and will be for a loooong time," the CEO of developer Arrowhead has insisted, adding: "as long as you folks keep playing and buying Super Credits we can keep it going."
title: Helldivers 2 'Is Our Main Focus and Will Be for a Loooong Time,' Arrowhead Boss Insists: 'As Long as You Keep Playing and Buying Super Credits We Can Keep It Going'

author: Vikki Blake
description: Valve has dismissed recent reports its Steam platform suffered a "major" data hack, confirming there was "NOT a breach" of Steam systems.
title: No, Steam User Data Was Not Compromised In a Hack, Confirms Valve

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Warner Bros. Games has announced and released Mortal Kombat 1: Definitive Edition, which it described as “the most extensive version” of the gory fighting game. But for fans, the release of the Definitive Edition has sparked significant concern that NetherRealm has now moved on from the game, and that it won’t see any new DLC characters or significant content updates.
title: Mortal Kombat 1: Definitive Edition Release Sparks Backlash, With Disgruntled Fans Fearing ‘The Game Is Done’ Less Than 2 Years After Launch

author: Vikki Blake
description: Square Enix has reaffirmed yesterday's roundabout confirmation that Kingdom Hearts 4 was still on the way in a brand-new message posted to social media that, complete with screenshots, leaves no doubt.
title: Square Enix Finally Breaks Silence On Kingdom Hearts 4, Shares Screenshots, Says It's 'Dedicated to Making this an Experience That Lives Up to Your Expectations'

author: Erik Adams
description: Love, Death and Robots Volume 4 continues to innovate and surprise, with great short films to be found in its wide variety of episodes.
title: Love, Death and Robots Volume 4 Review

author: Callum Williams
title: Xbox Game Pass: The Best Games to Play With Your Subscription (May 2025)

author: Adam Mathew
description: Winter’s nearly here, and with it comes the perfect excuse to hunker down with some great games at even better prices.
title: AU Deals: Save Serious Studs on LEGO Games, Clair Obscur, Hogwarts Legacy, Monster Huntin', and More!

author: Eric Song
description: $350 off after an LG.com exclusive coupon code.
title: The High-End 27" LG UltraGear 240Hz G-Sync OLED Gaming Monitor Is Majorly Discounted
